//Text Connect IT Connect IT Net Game Split Screen Game AI Game Tutorial Campaign Xs Os 0 Play Surrender Exit Exit After the installation for the correct operation of Google Play services Internet connection is required. Please, connect online and try again Internet connection issue Rating Choose game type Classical Blitz Normal Loading Stuff Looking for opponent for you. Please stand by Play at least one rating game to see yourself in a rating table YEAH! Ooops If you loose that game you had to start trip again from scratch. But you can avoid it by watching Ad O NO! Tie Congratulations! You are win :) I am cool Watch ad and save progress No Are you sure you want leave and loose? WOW! ERROR: Message Cause by OK Are you sure? There is always a chance that opponent will disconnect :) Surrender Os Xs You Enemy Only offline mode available :( At the moment the server is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance. Please come back in a couple of hours. The application is out of date, please update the application to be able to play via the network. Can not connect to server because of unknown reason. Please check your internet connection Your rating: Delta rating: Congratulations, you are winner! Next level Take reward Watch AD You are loose. To save progress, watch AD Play again Play again Loose progress A tie is when both loose Unexpected error during sign in Registration Please register to be able save your progress across all devices
Privacy Policy
//===============Tutorial Content Text=====================// This game is easy to start, hard to master type of games. Let's learn just three basic rules Collect three your's figures to get 1 score Put a figure near your enemy's figure to gain 4+ score Look at the score! You have so much score because you have shrunk a long line with an enemy figure The lines that you can shrink may be of any length, even that large You can shrink in any direction. Let's try diagonal for example You can use abilities. Wow, you got one. Look at the bottom of screen where abilities is located It is Durable ability. It is special figure that can't be crossed by enemy. Use it now to make your opponent earning any points a harder task! //===============Tutorial Steps Names=====================// Tutorial Just put a figure O, here is the enemy Maximize your score Choose any direction Use ability
Breaking Umbrella built the Connect IT app as an Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by Breaking Umbrella at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that We collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

 Information Collection and Use 
For a better experience, while using our Service, We may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that We request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy. The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. 
List third party service providers used by the app 
Google Play Services 
Appodeal 
Log Data 
We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app We collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilising our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics. 
Service Providers 
We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons: 
To facilitate our Service; 
To provide the Service on our behalf; 
To perform Service-related services; or 
To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used. 
We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose. 
Security 
We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and We cannot guarantee its absolute security. 
Links to Other Sites 
This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. 
Children’s Privacy 
These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case We discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, We immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that We will be able to do necessary actions. 
Changes to This Privacy Policy 
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page. 
Contact Us 
If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at breakingumbrellateam@gmail.com Register Login Register later "The email address is already in use by another account" Policy Profile Test Menu My abilities
It is special figure that can't be crossed by enemy. It is special figure that invisible for enemy but visible for you This ability allow you to destroy any figure on the field This ability brings you second turn. This ability will be opened soon Got it New ability unlocked Level I got it Yes
Choose abilities You get a reward when you ll finished level Durable figure Invisible figure Destroy figure Second chance
